text: What is true about the Cost

answer_options.answer_text: A negative score can occur in the BOM Discussion if more than 7 assemblies miss from the BOM.
Costs for CFD analysis must be included in the CBOM for the Aerodynamic System
To obtain at least 1 point in the C&M event in 2022, the maximum cost of a vehicle can not exceed EUR 68.972
An assembly may be broken down into parts or sub-assemblies
